Order Models¶

class orders.models.Order(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Store Order

Parameters

  • id (AutoField) – Id

  • product (ForeignKey to Product) – Product. Product id being purchased

  • buyer (ForeignKey to User) – Buyer. buyer of order from user model - must not be admin

  • amount (FloatField) – Amount. order amount in buyer currency - must be gt 0 and equal to product price

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
static get_sum_purchased() → float[source]¶

return the sum of all purchased products

override save function to ensure validations
